docs.snippet: REPUBLICAN PRIMARY ELECTIONS.-The election, by the Republican Party, of delegates to the various nominating Conventions for the coming Charter election, took place last evening. The polls were held at the head-quarters of the Republican Associations...

headline.main: GENERAL CITY NEWS.; The Board of Canvassers. The Industrial Congress. Police Reports. STOLEN GOODS DUG OUT OF THE EARTH-PROMPT ARRESTS.

docs.lead_paragraph: REPUBLICAN PRIMARY ELECTIONS.-The election, by the Republican Party, of delegates to the various nominating Conventions for the coming Charter election, took place last evening. The polls were held at the head-quarters of the Republican Associations of each Ward, and were kept open from 7 to 9 P.M. Considerable interest was manifested in this election, and a large vote was polled, although there was no exciting contest between rival delegates in any of the Wards.

headline.main: DECISIONS IN ADMIRALTY.; United States District Court. Before Judge Betts. CHARTER--LIEN ON CARGO FOR FREIGHT--CONSIGNOR AND CONSIGNEE. Increase of the Judges' Salaries. ADVERSE DECISION TO THE CLAIMANTS ON DEMUR RER. Court of Oyer and Terminer. BILLY MULLIGAN ON TRIAL-THE "FANCY" IN COURT-MORRISSEY ON THE STAND-THE TRIAL NOT FINISHED-"BILLY" COMMITTED TO THE TOMBS. Court of General Sessions. A ROBBER SENT TEN YEARS TO SING SING-A THIEF SENT THREE YEARS AND A HALF TO THE SAME PLACE-ROBBERIES, ASSAULTS AND LARCENIES TRIED. The Pauper Dead. EXCAVATIONS IN POTTER'S FIELD. Accommodation Paper. Verdict for Freightage. Decisions. SUPREME COURT-SPECIAL TERM.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ira B. Davis et al. vs. Five Hundred and Seventy-four Bags of Coffee.-The libelants were the owners of tho schooner G. H. Townsend. In June, 1859, the master of the vessel chartered her to Christian Thomsen, for a voyage from this port to Rio Janeiro and back. The charter party contained the usual clause binding the vessel and the cargo to be laden on board for the faithful performance of the agreement.

docs.snippet: Since the day when the cry ran through the French camp before Moscow that the Kremlin was on fire, no such fright has been experienced as that which seized on the good people of Paris the other night when they were told that the Credit Mobilier was...
docs.lead_paragraph: Since the day when the cry ran through the French camp before Moscow that the Kremlin was on fire, no such fright has been experienced as that which seized on the good people of Paris the other night when they were told that the Credit Mobilier was on fire.

docs.snippet: Any good deed of the  Aldermen has peculiar claims to recognition. One such was recorded yesterday, in the shape of a resolution assigning to the Superior Court a suite of rooms in the brown-stone building at the corner of Chambers and Centre streets...
docs.lead_paragraph: Any good deed of the Aldermen has peculiar claims to recognition. One such was recorded yesterday, in the shape of a resolution assigning to the Superior Court a suite of rooms in the brown-stone building at the corner of Chambers and Centre streets apartments free from all the sanitary objections to which its present accommodations are subject.
